name: Hypnoteyes
description:
A casual game about using a TV set to pickle eyeballs.

Controls
  • arrow keys move the TV
  • M toggles music (not the sounds, though)
  • Esc exits the game
Credits
  • backgrounds and graphics inspiration by Kenney
  • music: Pondering the Cosmos by Ruskerdax
  • bottle break sound by spookymodem
  • font: Evil Empire by Tup Wanders
